data.title: TC strengthens its presence in the North East with latest merger
data.meta_description: TC Group announces the completion of a merger with North East-based accountancy practice, Harlands Accountants, to form ‘TC Harlands’.
data.text:
TC Group is pleased to announce the completion of a merger with North East-based accountancy practice, Harlands Accountants, to form ‘TC Harlands’.

This deal continues TC Group’s successful M&A Strategy.

TC Group is an Accountancy Age ‘Top 25’ firm of accountants and tax advisers specialising in the provision of bespoke, high-quality accountancy and taxation solutions. Our expert knowledge and experience allow us to provide our clients with results designed to meet the unique needs of their businesses.

It is this proactive and tailored approach that ensures we can meet the needs of our clients. This allows them to remain functional, compliant, and most of all, profitable. Our proactive accountancy services boost our clients’ bottom line and help them to make the right decisions both now and for the future.

Based across the UK, we have several locations offering excellence in accountancy – so we are always well resourced to handle your financial concerns in a professional, cost-effective, and timely fashion.

TC Harlands will gain the support of TC Group’s national and international network. This will enable Harlands to expand their service offering to clients.

The partners at Harlands commented, “This is a significant milestone in our journey and this merger with TC allows us to help more clients build their businesses across the UK. Furthermore, having spent considerable time with the TC team already, we are excited that we will be able to continue to evolve the role and perception of accountants over the coming months and years. Our shared values align perfectly, and we are confident that this collaboration will be great for all the team and our clients.”

TC Group’s Head of Partner Services Mark Adams commented: “Harlands is a trusted and highly regarded firm of business advisors and accountants who provide an outstanding service to their clients. By joining TC Group, they give us a major boost to our representation in the North East. Harlands’ addition to TC Group represents, once again, our strategy of joining forces with ambitious firms that wish to merge and grow.”
